content: ## Node controls To view node controls, hover over the node on the canvas: * **Execute step** ![Execute step icon](/_images/common-icons/play-node.png){.off-glb}: Run the node. * **Deactivate** ![Deactivate node icon](/_images/common-icons/power-off.png){.off-glb}: Deactivate the node. * **Delete** ![Delete node icon](/_images/common-icons/delete-node.png){.off-glb}: Delete the node. * **Node context menu** ![Node context menu icon](/_images/common-icons/node-context-menu.png){.off-glb}: Select node actions. Available actions: * Open node * Execute step * Rename node * Deactivate node * Pin node * Copy node * Duplicate node * Select all * Clear selection * Delete node
